title: 98/111/EC: Commission Decision of 27 January 1998 extending the period referred to in Article 15(2a) of Directive 66/403/EEC on the marketing of seed potatoes
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 27 January 1998 extending the period referred to in Article 15(2a) of Directive 66/403/EEC on the marketing of seed potatoes (98/111/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 15(2a) of Directive 66/403/EEC, the date '31 March 1997` is replaced by '31 March 1998`.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 January 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
